document.full_text: - survivors of osama bin laden's al qaeda attacks and relatives of victims welcomed his killing as the death of the devil on monday but they also expressed anger and renewed grief for loved ones.
document.title: mix of joy, relief and anger at bin laden death
lines_and_colors: - survivors of osama bin laden's al qaeda attacks and relatives of victims welcomed his killing as the death of the devil on monday but they also expressed anger and renewed grief for loved ones.
